Xbox has announced when the next Developer Direct showcase will go live. Taking to the official Xbox Wire this morning, it won’t be long before we get another official look at Forza Horizon 6, Fable, and more.

items.title: Illicit crypto addresses received a record $154B in 2025, up 162% YoY, driven by sanctions evasion; Russia's A7A5 token transacted $93.3B+ in less than one year (Chainalysis)
items.summary:
Chainalysis:
Illicit crypto addresses received a record $154B in 2025, up 162% YoY, driven by sanctions evasion; Russia's A7A5 token transacted $93.3B+ in less than one year  —  In 2025, we tracked a notable rise in nation-state activity in crypto, marking the latest phase in the maturation of the illicit on-chain ecosystem.

items.summary: Microsoft's annual Xbox Developer Direct event is taking place on January 22nd this year. items.title: Mexico murder rate down 40% under Sheinbaum, president says
items.summary: Jan ‌8 (Reuters) - Mexico's daily ‌murder rate has ‌fallen nearly 40% from where it was ‍when Mexican President ‍Claudia Sheinbaum ‌took office, government officials ‍said ​on Thursday. Read full story

items.title: Star Wars Outlaws for Switch 2 now back down to $30 Amazon low (50% off)
items.summary:
While still find a host of Switch 1 and 2 game deals down below, Amazon has now brought back its all-time low pricing on the Star Wars Outlaws – Gold Edition for Nintendo Switch 2. Landing on the heels of the new purple/light green Joy-Con 2 Nintendo revealed today, Amazon has now dropped Star Wars Outlaws – Gold Edition back down to $30 with free shipping for Prime members or in orders over $35. Regularly $60, this is a straight up 50% off the list price and the lowest price we can find for the Switch 2 edition. Today’s deal is matching the Black Friday price and the lowest price we have tracked on Amazon since release. 

Nintendo just officially revealed the new purple/light green Switch 2 Joy-Con

items.title: Bluetti launches Alternator & Solar dual DC Charger 2 + bundles from CES 2026 with up to 48% exclusive savings from $332
items.summary:
Coinciding and launching from CES 2026, Bluetti is now offering its brand new on-the-go charging solution alongside several bundle options and even exclusive savings for our readers. Things kick-off with the standalone Alternator & Solar Dual DC Charger 2 at $331.55 shipped, after using the exclusive code ELECTREK5OFF at checkout for an additional 5% savings. This all-new unit will fetch $599 after these initial discounts settle, with this not only being the first chance to save, but using our code scores you $17 more savings than you’d normally get. All-in-all, you’re looking at a combined $267 markdown that sets the bar for future discounts throughout the New Year – and don’t forget all the additional bundle options to also score power stations, solar panels, and more with it, which you can find below.

items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, Jackery is offering its HomePower 3000 Portable Power Station with 4x 100W Prime Solar Panels at $1,614.04 shipped, which is not an available bundle on its direct website. This collection would normally run you $3,499 without any discounts, with today’s rate having only been beaten out by the two drops to $1,599 and the one-time $1,444 low from Black Friday. You can pick it all up here for your nomadic lifestyle with $1,885 savings, dropping it to the third-lowest price we have tracked. Of course, if you only need the power station, you can get that standalone unit down at $1,099 shipped right now.
